concept.title: Worth it or not the pros and cons of a startup

fig.title: Pros and cons of a Sturtup. Image from: whatsup.es

image.alt: Pros and cons of a Startup.

conbody.p: Just like everything else, start-ups have their pros and cons. It's great to hear about the perks, but keep in mind that almost 90% of start-ups fail, so it's smart to check out the risks.
